AT.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
AT.description: In „Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice“ sucht Phoenix an einem ganz neuen Schauplatz nach der Wahrheit: einem Gerichtssaal im Königreich Khura’in, der Geburtsstätte der Kurain Channeling Technique, wo in geheimnisvollen Séance-Prozessen über das Schicksal der Angeklagten entschieden wird. Währenddessen hält Strafverteidiger Apollo Justice in der Wright Anything Agency die Stellung, was gar nicht so einfach ist, übernimmt er doch einen Fall mit explosiven Ausmaßen. Bei ihrem Kampf für Gerechtigkeit treffen unsere beiden Helden auf eine Reihe alter Freunde und Gegner. Diesen Fall solltest du unbedingt übernehmen, denn es erwarten dich zahlreiche rätselhafte Geheimnisse, unvergessliche Charaktere und ganz neue Ermittlungstechniken.

AU.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
AU.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice sees Phoenix in a brand new location: a courtroom situated in the Kingdom of Khura’in, origin of the Kurain Channeling Technique, where mysterious séance trials decide the fate of all defendants. Meanwhile, defense attorney Apollo Justice faces his own challenges holding down the fort at the Wright Anything Agency, as he takes on a case that will have explosive implications. Both our heroes are joined by a host of returning friends and adversaries in their fight to bring about justice. Filled with puzzling mysteries to solve, a cast of memorable characters, and all new investigation techniques, this is one case you'll definitely want to take.

BG.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice

BE.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
BE.description: Dans Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice, Phoenix doit faire la preuve de ses talents d'avocat devant un tribunal de plus étranges. Située dans le royaume de Khura'in, d'où est originaire la mystérieuse technique de Kurain Channeling, cette cour voit en effet des esprits de décider du sort des accusés. Resté au cabinet Wright Anything Agency, l'avocat de la défense Apollo Justice a du pain sur la planche, lui aussi... car il vient d'accepter une affaire aux implications explosives. Luttant d'arrache-pied pour que justice soit faite, nos deux héros croiseront de nombreux alliés et adversaire bien connus. Énigmes à résoudre, personnages mémorables et techniques d'investigation inédites... Voilà une affaire à ne surtout pas rater !

ES.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
ES.description: En Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit, Phoenix Wright visita un nuevo lugar: un tribunal ubicado en el Kingdom of Khura’in, origen de la Kurain Channeling Technique, donde el destino de todos los acusados se decide en misteriosas sesiones de espiritismo. Mientras tanto, el abogado defensor Apollo Justice afronta sus propios retos encargándose de la Wright Anything Agency, en un caso con implicaciones explosivas. A nuestros dos protagonistas se les une un elenco de viejos amigos y adversarios en su lucha por que se haga justicia. Con muchos y misteriosos puzles que resolver, personajes inolvidables y técnicas de investigación completamente nuevas, este es un caso que no querrás dejar escapar.

IT.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
IT.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice porta Phoenix in una nuova località: un tribunale nel Regno di Khura’in, dove ha origine la Kurain Channeling Technique e dove misteriose sedute spiritiche decidono il destino di tutti gli imputati. Nel frattempo, anche l'avvocato difensore Apollo Justice dovrà affrontare le sue sfide mentre tiene in piedi la baracca della Wright Anything Agency facendosi carico di un caso che avrà delle implicazioni esplosive. Vecchi amici e avversari si uniranno ai nostri due eroi nella loro lotta per far trionfare la giustizia. Tra misteriosi enigmi da risolvere, un cast di personaggi memorabili e nuovissime tecniche investigative, questo è un caso da non farsi scappare.

NL.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
NL.description: In Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice bevindt Phoenix zich in een totaal nieuwe locatie: een rechtbank in het koninkrijk Khura’in, de oorsprong van de Kurain Channeling Technique, waar mysterieuze séancerechtzaken het lot van alle verdachten bepalen. Ondertussen heeft advocaat voor de verdediging Apollo Justice zijn handen vol aan de Wright Anything Agency, als hij een zaak aanneemt die explosieve gevolgen zal hebben. Samen met een heel stel terugkerende vrienden en vijanden vechten onze beide helden voor gerechtigheid. Allerlei puzzelmysteries die opgelost moeten worden, een heel stel gedenkwaardige personages en totaal nieuwe onderzoekstechnieken. Dit is met recht een zaak die je zeker op je wilt nemen.

NZ.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
NZ.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice sees Phoenix in a brand new location: a courtroom situated in the Kingdom of Khura’in, origin of the Kurain Channeling Technique, where mysterious séance trials decide the fate of all defendants. Meanwhile, defense attorney Apollo Justice faces his own challenges holding down the fort at the Wright Anything Agency, as he takes on a case that will have explosive implications. Both our heroes are joined by a host of returning friends and adversaries in their fight to bring about justice. Filled with puzzling mysteries to solve, a cast of memorable characters, and all new investigation techniques, this is one case you'll definitely want to take.

PL.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice

Meanwhile, defense attorney Apollo Justice faces his own challenges holding down the fort at the Wright Anything Agency, as he takes on a case that will have explosive implications. Both our heroes are joined by a host of returning friends and adversaries in their fight to bring about justice. Filled with puzzling mysteries to solve, a cast of memorable characters, and all new investigation techniques, this is one case you'll definitely want to take.

PT.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
PT.description: Em Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice, Phoenix vê-se num novo local: um tribunal situado no Reino de Khura’in, origem da Técnica de Canalização de Kurain, em que misteriosos julgamentos espíritas decidem o destino de todos os réus. Entretanto, o advogado de defesa Apollo Justice enfrenta os seus próprios desafios, segurando o forte na Wright Anything Agency, tendo a seu cargo um caso que terá implicações explosivas. Na sua luta para que se faça justiça, juntaram-se aos nossos dois heróis uma série de amigos e adversários antigos. Cheio de mistérios intrigantes para resolver, um elenco de personagens memoráveis e novas técnicas de investigação, este é um caso que não vais querer perder.

RU.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
RU.description: В Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice Phoenix попадает в совершенно новую обстановку: зал суда в королевстве Khura’in, где зародилась Kurain Channeling Technique и судьбу всех подсудимых решают загадочные спиритические сеансы. Трудное испытание предстоит и адвокату Apollo Justice, оставшемуся за главного в Wright Anything Agency – он берется за дело со взрывоопасными последствиями. На пути к торжеству справедливости оба наших героя встретятся с множеством старых друзей и противников. Труднейшие загадки, запоминающиеся персонажи и невиданные ранее методы расследования – такое дело вы точно не захотите пропустить!

SE.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Spirit of Justice
SE.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Spirit of Justice sees Phoenix in a brand new location: a courtroom situated in the Kingdom of Khura’in, origin of the Kurain Channeling Technique, where mysterious séance trials decide the fate of all defendants.
